# cmccloudv2_waf_ip (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create a waf IP
resource "cmccloudv2_waf_ip" "ip1" {
    waf_id      = "4f50b772-97a7-4177-ab18-2b84629de4d3"
    ip          = "116.104.138.50"
    type        = "deny" # deny, ignore
    description = "desc"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ip` (String) The IP address to add to the WAF
- `type` (String) The type of the IP address, ignore or deny
- `waf_id` (String) The ID of the WAF

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the IP address
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
